Property Type: Entire residential home hosted by TravelNest
Amenities List: Birch Lodges sleep up to 4 in one King Bedroom and one Twin Bedroom with a family bathroom. The Birch Lodges boast a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher which opens out an open plan dining/living room (with TV and DVD player). Each lodge has an enclosed decking around the front and side with featuring patio furniture.
